## 2.0.2 - 09/03/2020

- Aligned agni to jarvis infra

## 2.0.0 - 01/01/2020

- Deprecate `createWithDomain()` for `create()`.
- Add `createProxy()`
- Change configurations to go to `app-${env}.guesty.com`
